title: Cobbler
description: man with large nose wearing glasses and a cap, seated on a stool in front of a door beneath the roots of a tree; man is stitching a shoe, with other shoes on the ground by his feet; smaller figure in a tall wooly dark cap seated on the ground in front of the man; possible graphite additions on some shoes, on smaller figure\'s cap and on shadow behind cobbler
creditline: Gift of James C. and Kathryn L. Hogan
